column4: is anyone else having trouble installing gnome3 using the apt line: ppa:gnome3-team/gnome3 ???
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:gnome3-team/gnome3; sudo apt-get update    not work ok?
there is no lucid ppa on that server: http://ppa.launchpad.net/gnome3-team/gnome3/ubuntu/dists/
there isn't support for Lucid on the PPA you added.
